styles.header: w-full bg-white p-4 flex items-center mb-12
styles.h1: text-[3.5rem] leading-[1.2] text-[#A47864] font-semibold text-[#fff] mb-12
styles.h6: text-base leading-[1.6] text-[#835E4F] font-medium mb-2 tracking-[1px] uppercase
styles.button: w-max relative h-auto p-3 px-8 rounded cursor-pointer uppercase self-end text-white bg-[#000] mb-4 flex items-center gap-2 pointer group
styles.input: px-3 py-2 border border-[#D9D9D9] rounded-md text-base text-[#333333]
styles.textarea: px-3 py-2 border border-[#D9D9D9] rounded-md text-base text-[#333333]
styles.select: px-3 py-2 border border-[#D9D9D9] rounded-md text-base text-[#333333] outline-0 shadow-none
styles.label: text-base mb-1 block text-[#333333]
styles.th: p-3 border border-[#D9D9D9] bg-[#C29A85] text-white text-left
styles.blockquote: p-4 my-4 border-l-4 border-[#A47864] bg-[#F8F0F0] italic text-[#333333]
styles.code: font-mono text-sm bg-[#F8F0F0] text-[#D6336C] px-2 py-1 rounded
styles.pre: font-mono text-sm bg-[#F8F0F0] text-[#D6336C] p-4 rounded overflow-x-auto
